;摘要

;在美国西部沿海地区，大气河流（atmospheric rivers，ARs）与最大的降水产生风暴有关，贡献了高达年降水量的一半，但ARs对大气的影响综合水文循环，特别是关于地下水储存和流体动力学的综合水文循环，在很大程度上是未知的。 To better explore the hydrologic behavior of AR versus non-AR event precipitation, we present a novel combination of two water tracking methods (one in the atmosphere and one in the subsurface) to explicitly track the full lifecycle of water parcels generated by ARs.
